loginPage.label: Username or email
loginPage.languageChange: Jeśli chcesz zmienić język kliknij tu:

addContractor.title: Contractor Data
addContractor.addInfo: New Contractor: {{firstName}} {{lastName}} has been added successfully.

userChangePasswordPopup.title: Password change for the user.
userChangePasswordPopup.onSuccess: The password has been changed successfully.

actionsResult.passwordReset: Password of the user: {{username}} has been reset successfully.

addUser.title: User data

editUserPopup.onSuccess: User data: {{username}} has been edited successfully.

addUser.addInfo: New User: {{username}} has been added successfully.

popupCloseMessages.onOpenForm: Do you really want to close the form? Any unsaved changes will be lost.
popupCloseMessages.onSubmitEditContractor: Are your sure that you want to change the contractor data?
popupCloseMessages.onExitFromContractorEditing: Your changes are not saved, are you sure you wanna leave this page?
popupCloseMessages.onDeleteContractor: Are you sure you want to delete this contractor? It will remove contractor permanently. Remember that if contractor has any contract you cannot delete him.
popupCloseMessages.onResetPassword: Are you sure you want to reset the password to the initial settings? This action is irreversible.
popupCloseMessages.onBlockUser: Are you sure you want to deactivate user: {{username}}? You can reverse this action at any time and activate the user.
popupCloseMessages.onUnblockUser: Are you sure you want to activate user {{username}}?
